alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer; Schoharie; Southern Herkimer; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 4:15AM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Storm total accumulation of 4 to 8 inches, with locally up to 10 inches at highest peaks of the central Adirondacks and eastern Catskills. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The western and central Adirondacks, western Mohawk Valley, Schoharie Valley and eastern Catskills * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to snow covered roadways and low visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The weight of the snow combined with gusty winds could lead to downed trees and power lines resulting in some power outages. The higher snowfall amounts will occur at elevations above 1500 feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
